text: (visvasigale,) janaru allahana horatu yarannella prarthisuttaro avarannu mudalisabedi â€“ (nivu mudalisidare) avaru hagetanadinda, arivillade allahanannu mudalisuvaru. I riti navu pratiyondu samudayada palige adara krtyavannu candaganisiruvevu. Konege avaru tam'ma odeyana balige maralalikkide. Aga avaru maduttiddudu enembudannu avanu avarige tilisuvanu
